metadata.name: Bodies Edition #1
metadata.description:
"Bodies" started in September of 2020 as an exploration of what it means to be human in our own skin. As it sits, there are 21 images minted to the blockchain from the project with a floor of .25 eth. 

"Bodies" exists to celebrate and champion all walks of life and body types as they naturally exist. No Photoshop or airbrushing was used in this collection; It's just humans existing as themselves. 

I want everyone to be able to own a piece of this collection and not have the price be a barrier to entry. 

This is the first edition image. 

Pictured here is Anthony and his body.
